field.name: producer_company_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select company_id,abbreviation,npn, description, tax_id, zip from carriercompanies_lku

field.name: agent_lic_company_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select company_id,abbreviation,npn, description, tax_id, zip from carriercompanies_lku

field.name: producer_company_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select company_id,abbreviation,npn, description, tax_id, zip from carriercompanies_lku

field.name: reason_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select master_lookup_data_id, master_lookup_data_desc from master_lookup_data_lku where master_lookup_detail_id in(select master_lookup_detail_id from master_lookup_detail_lku where lookup_table_name='agency_termination_reason_lku')

field.name: co_op_ad_dollar_spent
field.labeldesc: Co-Op Advertising dollar amount spent YTD

field.name: county_w9
field.lookupobjectsql: select county_id as county,description from county_lku where state_id=#state_id_w9# order by description

field.name: category_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select category_id, description from category_lku where description='E&O' order by description asc

field.name: bobtransfersStep2_dest_producer_code
field.lookupobjectsql: select p.person_id as sub_producer_key, p.prdcr_first_name+' '+p.prdcr_last_name+' ('+spa.sub_producer+')' as sub_producer_value from sub_producer_association spa inner join person p on spa.person_id=p.person_id where producer_number_id in (select producer_number_id from producer_number where producer_number= #producer_number_to_varchar# )

field.name: bobtransfersStep2_dest_producer_code_step3
field.lookupobjectsql: select p.person_id as sub_producer_key, p.prdcr_first_name+' '+p.prdcr_last_name+' ('+spa.sub_producer+')' as sub_producer_value from sub_producer_association spa inner join person p on spa.person_id=p.person_id where producer_number_id in (select producer_number_id from producer_number where producer_number= #producer_number_to_varchar# )

field.name: wholesale_from_producer
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct c.Policy_attribute_3 as person_id, p.prdcr_first_name+' '+p.prdcr_last_name+'('+spa.sub_producer+')' as person_name from commission_statement_details c inner join sub_producer_association spa on c.Policy_attribute_3=spa.person_id and c.producer_number_id =spa.producer_number_id inner join person p on p.person_id =c.Policy_attribute_3 inner join producer_number pn on pn.producer_number_id=c.producer_number_id and pn.producer_number=#producer_number_from_varchar# where isnumeric(c.Policy_attribute_3)=1

field.name: wholesale_to_producer
field.lookupobjectsql: select p.person_id as sub_producer_key, p.prdcr_first_name+' '+p.prdcr_last_name+' ('+spa.sub_producer+')' as sub_producer_value from sub_producer_association spa inner join person p on spa.person_id=p.person_id where producer_number_id in (select producer_number_id from producer_number where producer_number= #producer_number_to_varchar# )

field.name: reason_noncommissionable_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select reason_noncommissionable_id,reason_noncommissionable_description from reason_noncommissionable_lku order by reason_noncommissionable_description
